title: Almost impossible to contact customer service!
text: Several times now, a listing of mine has been removed for unapplicable reasons, and there‚Äôs almost no way to get a hold of anyone to resolve it. The first time I had two similar items posted that they said were duplicate, even though they were different sizes, and it stated so in the descriptions. This last time they removed my listing saying, I violated copyright regarding photos. I took the photos myself! I have the before pictures with background, and the ones I posted without. It is almost impossible to find how to contact them and let them know that they removed my listing in error, and that I didn‚Äôt violate catalog rules! They threaten to remove you from the platform if you continually violate the rules‚Ä¶ But there‚Äôs no way to get them to correct that you never violated rules in the first place!

title: Bad customer support
text: An item I purchased got lost‚Ä¶ due to the carriers fault. So I reached out to the carrier directly as well as to Vinted. And Vinted just dropped the case‚Ä¶ both the seller and myself have for over one week reached out to them and asked for help. Their response: we can‚Äôt help-this our final response üò≥üò°. And than they stopped communicating completely. I kept writing if anyone heard back from the carrier, if anyone could help? Nothing‚Ä¶ I used to love LOVE shopping there, now not so much. If something goes south, there‚Äôs a chance they will leave you hanging. I‚Äôm very disappointed.

title: Don‚Äôt sell here unless you want no pay/no item
text: I have sold on here for the past year and I keep the receipts from every time I drop packages off at the post office but apparently that didn‚Äôt matter as they cancelled the order after it did not track like it should‚Äôve done and I submitted the receipt as my only proof that I shipped the item. If I stay with this app I guess I will take a selfie with the mail lady/man I give the package to as I have no idea what counts as prof of shipment if the receipt doesn‚Äôt. Find another app to sell your items, unless you want to just give them away but I would recommend NUW if you are wanting to do that, much nicer ppl!

title: my buyers have dropped since shipping increased
text: as a seller this app has many problems as i‚Äôm sure other selling apps do. the shipping has gotten crazily expensive and i‚Äôve noticed so much less buyers and i haven‚Äôt really bought much myself since the shipping has increased. sure there‚Äôs a reason shipping has gotten expensive but i just can‚Äôt justify spending a extra $10 on shipping and fees when the shirt i want is only $2. i appreciate the app doesn‚Äôt take fees and i hope this doesn‚Äôt change otherwise i will definitely move to another selling app since the no fees is the only reason i stick with vinted. i just hope the shipping price will eventually drop to what it used to be. when i joined vinted shipping was only $3 now the lowest shipping is reaching $7. i get super lowball offers which i didn‚Äôt before the shipping increase but honestly i understand the low balls, if i don‚Äôt even want to pay $10 in shipping in fees i don‚Äôt expect many of my followers to either.
